Container.Name: Kerberos.io
Container.Overview: Kerberos.io is a low-budget video surveillance solution, that uses computer vision algorithms to detect changes, and that can trigger other devices. Kerberos.io is open source so everyone can customize the source code to their needs and share it with the community under the CC-NC-ND license model. When deployed on the Raspberry Pi, it has a green footprint and it's easy to install; you only need to transfer the Kerberos.io OS (KIOS) to your SD card and that's it.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where kerberos will store it's configuration files.[br]
